pip:Resource.pip:name: CopyDicomFiles
pip:Resource.pip:description: Copies dicom files for a scan of a session

pip:argument.pip:name: xnatId
pip:argument.pip:description: XNAT Session ID for which files are to copied

pip:argument.pip:name: scan
pip:argument.pip:description: Scan Id(s) for which files are to be copied

pip:argument.pip:name: destinationDir
pip:argument.pip:description: Path to directory to which files are to be copied

pip:argument.pip:name: archiveDir
pip:argument.pip:description: Path directory within which the session directory exists.
